name: Billy R. MELOT, petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Billy R. MELOT, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
casebody.head_matter:
Billy R. MELOT, petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 16-9687.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 2, 2017.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
